sudais.name: Sheikh Abdul Rahman Al-Sudais
sudais.description: Known for his beautiful and clear recitation, Sheikh Al-Sudais is the Imam of Masjid al-Haram in Mecca.

ghamdi.name: Sheikh Saad Al-Ghamdi
ghamdi.description: Renowned for his deeply emotional and heart-touching recitation that moves listeners to tears.

alafasy.name: Sheikh Mishary Rashid Alafasy
alafasy.description: Famous for his beautiful voice and rhythmic recitation that combines traditional and contemporary styles.

husary.name: Sheikh Mahmoud Khalil Al-Husary
husary.description: Master of Tajweed and classical recitation, known for his precise pronunciation and traditional style.

minshawi.name: Sheikh Mohamed Siddiq Al-Minshawi
minshawi.description: Known for his artistic and highly expressive recitation with beautiful melodic variations.

ajmi.name: Sheikh Ahmed Ali Al-Ajmi
ajmi.description: Known for his powerful voice and commanding presence in recitation.

shuraim.name: Sheikh Saud Al-Shuraim
shuraim.description: Imam of Masjid al-Haram known for his gentle and soothing recitation style.

maher.name: Sheikh Maher Al-Muaiqly
maher.description: Known for his melodious voice and deeply spiritual recitation that touches the heart.
